content.detailedDescription: 6:26 am looking e out of my patio doors. round lighted orb of gas/cloud? descending in smooth path from ene. orb lighted cloud disappeared and long, solid object appeared w/ a white light on each end. came down another second or two, then vanished in clear sky. where orbish, lit cloud disappeared a black irregular cloud remained and drifted away. same roundish orb reported today in 70053.
content.summary: Same as 70053 ~ only cloudish orb disappeared into solid object w/ 2 lights

content.detailedDescription: I was given this photo in 2004. it was in a family photo album of a friend of mine.
content.summary: Very large diamond shape cloaked in the clouds, fine detail on the sides,

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the film clip from abc news 7,and i noticed 2 things going across the screen at an incredible speed. i searched for the video on line. i found it,and if you look at the uper right,you can see a black object on the still picture.  and what i saw  was on the video was very disturbing. as i watched, i noticed 2 black objects coming straight down. i paused the video, it looked like 2 winged humanoids. sounds crazy. so i researched winged humanoid sightings. and came up with a video from 2005 that a rancher taped. looks exactly the same. i don't have the equipment to actually go frame by frame. so i used pause,play, pause. and this is the disturbing part.
i can sremember the 2 described humanoids actually go onto the plane,and it looks like they ripped it apart at the tail section. then they came off and decended. as the decended the ships, i will call them passed,2 of them. please keep in mind that all of this happened at a blink of an eye. the naked eye can't see this. it happened at incredible speed. our military doesn't have anything that can move that fast. please look at the video frame by frame.
a friend of mine went to the air show the next day,and he captured 2 of the ufo ships paswing while he was filming a hariate helicopter. he didn't see the objects passing until he watched the video.
 god help us, these things are not friendly. how would we protect ourselves from this entity. 
here is the link of the abc story

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Apparent air plane malfunction

content.detailedDescription: I came outside around 6:17 am to go to work; walked toward my car and noticed a bright spear like object hovering across the sky near the clouds. i quickly grabbed my phone and started filming a video. the object appeared like a little spear with a huge trail of white light which changed blue as it hovered into the clouds.
content.summary: I saw a huge light hovering across the sky which had a trail

content.detailedDescription: New video taken at 4x on samsung s4 smart phone .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: New information for case number 69846

content.detailedDescription:
My friend was driving on highway 27 in clermont florida on september 1st 2015. it was evening time and around dusk so the sun was going down. as she is driving she realizes that up in the sky she sees three twinkly white lights in a large triangular pattern but very far apart from each other. as she is driving she realizes that the lights are very bright and very beautiful at the same time. almost as if its a twinkling star but it's just too bright to be an actual star. 

as she is driving she keeps looking up and she realizes that these lights are following her car but at the same time they aren't moving they're staying stationary and just twinkling in and out but not fading away. almost as if someone is taking a light switch and lowering the light and then making it bright again lowering the light and making it bright again.

finally after about 15 minutes of her seeing the lights one went out then two went out then finally three went out. she's looking around not understanding what's going on and it's creeping her out because she doesn't know if anybody else is seeing what she seen in the sky.  she told me she doesn't know exactly how to feel about this encounter. at first she thought the lights were absolutely beautiful and it caught her attention and after that she felt this overwhelming sense that something wasn't right and just wanted to get home and not think about it again.

right after the third light went out is when she called me on the phone absolutely creeped out telling me that she knows i will be the only one that understands this since i have always been  the go to person for all things extraterrestrial  and i wouldn't judge her so she told me the whole story. she knew i wold know who to go to with this information. i told her i would do exactly what i could which was go to mufon and try to tell her story the best i can with the information she gave me.

she and i have been friends for almost 20 years. she is a very reliable person and not a lot of things freak her out she's very strong willed. always has been. so when she came to me with this and told me what happened to her in the car and i can tell on the phone that she was extremely weirded out by it. i knew that this had to be the real deal especially for her. she said to me "i know what i saw and if nobody wants to believe me then fine but no one is going to tell me that what i saw wasn't real". i believe her and i really hope that we find some evidence to prove her right of what she did see.
content.summary: Stationary lights over highway 27

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down route 79 and right after the bridge where you can exit for neville island, around those long curvy bends i turned my head because i saw bright lights. i had to double take because i thought it was just a hovering helicopter but when i looked again i saw a large black mass floating just above the tree line with huge lights all around the base and on the front of the structure. it was quiet, there was no noise and it just hovered there. i was unable to stop and observe it so i am unaware of how long it stayed there.
content.summary: Driving down route 79 and glanced to side. saw huge hovering mass with bright lights coming in all directions.

content.detailedDescription: Ok,last week 5:00 am my husband and i were sitting out in yhe back yard taking a heat wave break from our hot home.I looked up and saw a huge plate like disk floating east and facing north.This disk was floating stright up and down like a wall not the standard description.Ok fast forward to last night 9/1/2015,we let our dogs out in back yard at 8:31pm to go potty the dogs were quiet and we always time them 15 minutes to go potty while we wait in the house.Well they were out there about 9 minutes when all the sudden they started barking frantically.I asked my husband and 10 year old boy to go see what the hec they were going crazy over and my boy got up first to go open the back door and let them in and than the dogs really became agitated and we're refusing to come in and my boy at that point started making unlegable speach i knew something bad was happening i said to my husband get up quick go see what is going on.Than my boy came in hysterics shaking badly tears running down his face." this is what he said."there was someone outside our gate just standing there staring at the back door he was all black and had a big bald head and was short and skinny his head would of been back to my dads neck (4,11)his eyes were black and i could see a reflection in them.He had a mouth but no nose.I was trying to get the dogs in mom but they wouldn't come in i thought he was going to take our dogs. (as tears were rolling down his cheeks and shaken up).My husband went out to check but it was all over by than.We called 911 and 1 female officer came out and searched the empty 2 acre field behind our house than she pulled up behind our fence and my husband  went to talk to her as she was asking for description from my child the officer looked over her shoulder and stopped speaking as if she heard something out in the field than she proceeded to dispatch more officeres they came they searched and left then about 10 minutes lator a helecopter was out in the sky..Ok so fast forward to 9/2/15 8 hours later 5am i have to use the rest room as i'm in the bathroom something hits the ceiling hard like something was dropped in my attic abovey head i jump up wash my hands and now i'm writing this to hopefully get some answers.P.S.I told my boy to leave out the big head and no nose part or they would  think he was crazy and not search the property altho we believed him %100...
content.summary: Ufo was seen a week prior. large slow floating flat uprite cloudy white/grey/ disk.Large/huge.

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor and his wife were returning to our townhouse development on 08/29/2015 around 10 pm when that saw about a dozen or so lights in the northern sky glowing yellow and hovering some distance away. he stated that some of the objects remained stationary while one moved around in and out of the formation. he and his spouse explained that they had no idea what these lights were or what their origin might be. he stated he heard no noises from the objects but he knew that they did not seem like man-made devices. he stated that the objects finally moved off after about 10-15 minutes. my neighbor is a former police officer, federal investigator, and emt so he is not prone to fantasy! he stated that he took two(2)cell phone photos of these objects to document the sighting! after some discussion with me of the sighting i told him about mufon! he was interested but not enough to report this incident to mufon! he indicated, however, that if mufon wanted to talk with him about this sighting that he would cooperate. again i did not observe this sighting! i canvassed all of the local news media to see if any reports of this event were document! absolutely no mention of this event was found in any television news or newspaper reports. very strange!
content.summary: My neighbor actually made this observation, on 08/29/2015 at about 10 pm, and discussed this event with me a day later. he stated and his wife were returning to our townhouse development when he observed about a dozen or so lights in the northern sky!

content.detailedDescription: Observing from the north a ball of orange light appeared and changed to a silver glow with a chem trial behind, photos were taken of the trail left behind.
content.summary: A ball of ornage light entered the atmosphere changing to silver with a strange chemtrail

content.detailedDescription: Was at work on a weds morning aprox 6am doing routine checkup on equipment outaide. still dark at the time when what appeared to be a flash of light coming through a cloud anove me say north direction. the light was extremely bright and was casting an anormous tail, something that looked unreal at least, somerhing i have never seen even jetplanes do. the light (object) was moving very fast and there was what appeared to be another object tailong it with a flashing white light, seems as if it was trying to catch up to it. at one point the bright light object tirned sharply to a southeast difection as its tail, aura, grew and i lost sight of it in that direction. leaving what looked like a cloud and large  path behind it.
content.summary: Highspeed ufo in miami fl

content.detailedDescription: Entering atmosphere
content.summary: Wormhole

content.detailedDescription: There was a bright blue cloud following a single white light. the emission glowed and looked as if it was breaking the clouds and sky apart. the craft was descending. at one point, it turned our direction suddenly, then returned to the descent, creating a water-like ripple. after that, it quickly faded, then disappeared in the clouds, although it was appearing to still be descending. we only watched for a couple of minutes, while walking our dogs: 0625 est. florida.
content.summary: Thought it was a plane. but no noise. ripple created after changed direction. then went straight. blue cloud that glowed followed the white light. single light, like a star. left a heart shaped cloud at the top of the sky/decent.

content.detailedDescription:
1. 5th and sheridan, i was walking back from the store.

2. i always look at the sky at night when i go on walks or walks to the store, i noticed a weird blinking glowing lighting moving weirdly. (back and forth, up and down)

3. a ufo

4. the object was very small, maybe because it was really high in the sky. it was a star-like object that was blinking randomly but fast. i didn't see much detail because it was high. it kinda looked like an orb maybe. it shot up in the air and it was gone. 5 minutes later i see a "fireball" or a "meteor" that was glowing bright orange,it was leaving a trail of a gas like trail crossing the main street by the same location that i spotted the ufo. after 5 seconds the "fireball" or "meteor" vanished.

5. i was confused at first and was observing it, it moved weirdly and changed directions fast while blinking i then knew, i knew it was a ufo because i have had other experiences with ufo's in the past. i became excited that i had the chance to see another sighting. i called my dad because i just had to tell someone. actually, while i was on the phone with him after seeing the ufo i then saw the "fireball" while on the phone with my dad. i was so overwhelmed that this was happening i was yelling "wtf" and "omg" i then felt like i was about to be abducted, it was strange so i ran home and told everyone and posted it on facebook.

6.It just disappeared/vanished i kept my eyes on the 2 objects the whole time it was visible.
content.summary: After sighting the ufo a orange fireball appeared for 5 seconds or less.

content.detailedDescription:
Pictures of orb attached. not sure how to start other than to tell what i saw today. i was driving over the richmond san rafael bridge from work towards corte madera, ca today 9/1/15 at 3pm and i saw this extremely bright almost chrome-like sphere hovering over san quentin prison. it had a little bit of a blue hue to it and looked like it was rotating or pulsing. i couldn't pull over on the bridge and lost sight of it behind the hill. i was sure i'd catch it in the pass between the bridge and larkspur landing, so much so i got out of my car at the shooting range there and was perplexed that it wasn't there. i got back in my car hoping to see it again near corte madera. i was looking all over and when i was passing the ferry parking lot i saw it over the marsh by the village shopping center south of the 101. i lost site of it at the hill next to the parking lot because it was heading towards mt. tam. it was very low in the sky. i debated whether it would be easier to see it again from the back of the ferry or to go to the 101 south. i chose the hwy and was shocked i couldn't see it from the on ramp because it gives a very open view of the terrain. i was looking frantically to my left and only glanced to my right to turn off the freeway and spotted it on the opposite side on my far right between me and the north hill of corte madera. i pulled over immediately and used my work ipad to quickly snap 5 pictures in rapid succession. i decided i would stay put and not take my eyes off it because i had a goid vantage point (as you can see in the pictures). after 15-30 seconds it appeared to almost fad into itself and disappear. this transition took about 5 seconds. i sat there baffled and was looking at the hill behind the object to ensure i wasn't just seeing a massive reflection but there were clearly cars that had nearly no reflection on that route of the hill. the pictures don't show how bright this thing truly was. it was like looking into the sun. i retraced my drive and the object was seen unequivocally in different locations from multiple vantage points as they are separate lines of site. please let me know what you think this is!!!
images attached taken in rapid succession, maybe 6 seconds total for all 5 photos.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Extremely bright pulsating orb faint blue hue to white brightness. moved nw to sw, then nw.  unmistakable movement based on vantage points and sightlines.

content.detailedDescription:
In roseville, ca on september 1, 2015 i had just picked my daughter up from work and i decided to let her drive. as we were traveling west on douglas blvd we made a left turn onto rocky ridge drive (southbound). i saw a cylinder shaped object reflecting in the sun. it appeared to be at a 12 o'clock position at about 5 thousand feet altitude. initially, i thought it was a traffic airplane or a helicopter - but it wasn't. as i was trying to point the cylinder shaped craft out to my daughter, the object banked to its right still traveling south, then it simply disappeared. i continued to search for the object, but it was gone. the cylinder object had vanished before my eyes. all of this appeared to have happened in a matter of seconds. unfortunately, my daughter didn't see the object. as i write this note, i reflect on other instances where i had similar experiences. i've always wondered if anyone else has seen these objects here in roseville as well. i have shared many of these sightings with my family. my husband encouraged me to contact mufon. thank you for your time.

[name, email and phone number removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Chrome cylinder shape. no wings or blades and has no windows.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was working at the time 0430 9-1-15 (yesterday). in fourchon, la in port fourchon. a co worker and myself observed a strange light. i work on a boat and am very familiar with helicopters because i fly on them to get to work often as well as satellites, i see them often working offshore, it was none of these, that was discussed between us. so we watched this light, talking about it for nearly thirty minutes before it moved, it moved slightly west and upwards. then move seemed slow to us but it was a good distance away, probably a mile or more it was very hard to tell. i noticed the light because being a sailor i know the stars and all things in the sky spending much time outside watchkeeping. i alerted the mate to this. it was well below any star or satellite paths as well as too bright and early for helicopters.  a copter does fly by on the video later that morning, you will see it. i immediately thought it was a ufo having seen them before but did try to debunk it and couldn't. after about 40 minutes i went to the wheel house and grabbed some binoculars to see it better. upon looking through the binocs the object looked triangular instead of round, the light was so bright that it filled the space around it making it look round. eventually it moved a little more straight up really then back east and up and stopped then moved straight away from us and finally out of view, all of this happened very slowly this took two full hours from when it was seen until it was out of sight. this is the only time i've had a camera with me for a sighting i just hate that it's so small. there is something going on in the gulf of mexico, lately i have been seeing flashes of lights right above the water, hard to describe. i had to cut the video some to get it to send. what i have sent you is 3 videos clipped together and shortened. i have about 7 minutes of video all together on my phone. i am hoping you can zoom in on it somehow and get a closer look. thanks.  the second video is the one clipped together
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two witnesses observed bright light very still above radio tower, eventually moved west and up then east and up and gone. very bright. non threatening.

content.detailedDescription:
We were playing beach volleyball on a lighted court at dusk when a team-mate yelled "hey look at that." we all looked up and saw 4 bright red lights roughly equidistant from each other, 3 of which were in a line from west ascending to the east at about a 45 degree angle and travelling at the same speed. 

original position of lights when first sighted 

                  *
              * 
    *     
         *  

final position of lights when last seen
 
                 *
             *
         *
     *       

the second red light from the left was lower originally and out of alignment with the rest of the lights. it then changed direction ascending until it reached the proper position to be in alignment with the others lights as shown above. a few people wondered if it might be a group of ufos but no one could say for sure, but everyone was quite amazed at what was happening. a few people said they could not see the lights clearly without glasses. we were at least 12 players and most saw the lights. we had to continue our game and after a few more points i looked again and the lights were gone.
content.summary: 4 red lights equidistant and on a 45 degree angle mving west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 16 when i saw the ufo. there was a grade school across from my house we lived on a dead end street. i use to walk over to the back of the school at night to smoke so my parents couldn't see me. there was a doorway at the back that you stepped up to with brick walls on both side that hid me. it was dark and as i was standing there smoking it appeared out of nowhere i was frozen with fear and couldn't move it was right above me with blue and white lights all around the disc shape object . the lights were pulsating and in a circle of the disc. after about 5 minutes it was just gone i never saw it leave . i ran around the school to go home and as i rounded the corner of the school i was still looking up at the sky i saw it again but it was traveling so fast i  only saw it for a second and it was so far away that i realized that is why i didn't see it comming or leaving it was as fast as a blink of an eye, when i got home i asked my parents what was new on the news because i thought surely i couldn't be the only person who saw the object but i never heard any reports of anyone else seeing it. i couldn't tell my parents of this experience or anyone else for fear they would think i was crazy. i am now 61 years old but will never forget that night as long as i live.

thanks for reading my experience,
content.summary: I was about 16 and i use to go behind a grade school to smoke as i was standing there all of a sudden i looked up and hovering above me was a  hugh  shape disc with glowing lights . it was there then gone in a blink of a eye. i was  scared to death .

content.detailedDescription: As i went out onto my south facing balcony at 10:58pm, i noticed a large (what appeared to be dime-sized), bright, glowing orange ball (with a fuzzy aura) moving very fast from south to north west across the sky.  there was a plane about 50 miles to the west of it travelling in the same direction (flying parallel to each other).  the orange ball seemed to be travelling about 3-4 times the speed of the plane.  after about 2 minutes, it made an ekg-like "blip", while at the same time, the orange ball light instantly got brighter, then faded, then got bright again, (all the while travelling at about the same rate of speed) , then within a second or two, sped up immensely, then shot forward and disappeared.
content.summary: Noticed glowing orange ball, travelling fast, quickly jumped, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Observed a light move in large circles in and around cloudcover @ appx. 30 degrees elevation. made abrupt stops and direction changes. occasional flash/pulse, otherwise  steady purple light maintained throughout observation. then a fast descent at a slight angle below the horizon. observed the light ascend and repeat the same behavior three more times until a helicopter approached the area, and the activity ceased.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Violet/blue-red fast-moving light/object

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the street and saw a bright orange light to the east heading directly towards the west. i thought it was a light on a landing plane it was that bright but it was orange like a street light. it appeared to waiver like it was on fire. it approached the town then turned in a slow semi-circle to the south, then headed back east and disappeared into a nearby cloud. personally i think it was a hot air balloon but i've never seen one with a bright orange light on it before nor anywhere near this area (elevation 1,300 metres).
content.summary: Bright star light object

content.detailedDescription: While on vacation with my family i was hanging outside about 1am while my husband went inside the hotel to print out hershey tickets! enjoying the view i turned on my phone camera and tried to take a picture of the moon. i noticed a light coming from the ground slowly going up to the sky! i started to take as much pictures as i could seeing the light stop half way up and disappeared! it was strange! next day we walked to site to see if there was a spot light or anything on the ground and nothing was there!
content.summary: Bright light coming from ground

content.detailedDescription: On august 12th 2015 my boss was talking pictures of the house . he came in and showed us a picture of what could only be described as a flying bell with a dark bottom. he showed us the picture before the of the object as well as the one after.It took him less the 5 seconds to snap the picture.It wasn't there then it was and it was gone almost like it was to fast for the eye.My boss didn't see it in any of the three pictures until he check on his way into the house. several times at night numerous staff have been outside at night and seen red objects rise straight up and take off at a blinding speed.
content.summary: Took three pictures of house not there next picture there next picture not there

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving down a back road in the maryville,walland area in south east tennessee. i happened to look up at the sky due to an array of lights hovering not far from the ground. i quickly told my husband to look and he immediately recognized the craft due to a childhood run in with it not even 5 miles from where we were. we pulled over and watched as the craft hovered, slowly ascended and began to slowly move in sort of a square, making quick 90 degree turns that are simply not possible with civilian or commercial air craft. the craft was seemingly doing a square path over a large corn field. it moved so slow yet, it was so precise in its movements. my husband and other locals in this area have told so much about the same experience and i had always thought they were imagining it..... not anymore.
content.summary: Hovering black triangle with corner lights close to road.

content.detailedDescription: Video found on webcam this morning. six objects appearing bright in straight line formation moving through the woods at night toward our webcam and passing by. this wildlife webcam is stationary to a pine tree approximately 4 foot off the ground. video does not have the best clarity. not sure if it could possibly be some type of night birds. the deer in the video appears to look nervous after passing. there is no sound available on the video camera. also the direction the lights come from are thick brushy woods.
content.summary: 6 light objects in straight line formation moving forward past camera

content.detailedDescription: i lived in tonawanda ny which is north of the city of buffalo and i lived across the road from a very large grassy park area which was near the niagara river. i always watched the stars and my husband was working nights. because of the park and river nearby aside from the house tops the sky line was wide open, it was about midnight in the summer, i " think" it was around 1970 no later then 1971 or earlier then 1966 . we lived on the second floor, had a small balcony off the bedroom with a screen door which is where i star gazed. while i looked up i saw a very odd sight which was a perfect circle of lights higher then an airplane flies or so it appeared. there had to be about 8 or 9 bright lighted objects forming this circle and looked to be equal distance apart. i was trying to figure out what constellation this could be in such a perfect circle, one i had never seen before. they remained stationary for quite a long time when all of a sudden one of the objects left this circle and the others quickly closed that gap to again be what appeared equal distance apart. within minutes this huge object appeared  to my left just above the tree tops and house tops and very slowly and silently moved about 2 houses away from me . there were huge windows all along the side of this object which appeared to be a dark dull grey. but the windows were well lit with a red glow and i could clearly see inside . there appeared to be several instrument panels but i never saw any humanoid forms or anything else for that matter. i was so awed by this that i never thought to go to the front of my place to look out the front windows to see which direction it was headed. it was like i was stuck and could not move or maybe i just didn't want to move. when i looked up again after this craft was gone that circle of lighted objects were also gone.  but here is the clincher. we did not get the daily news paper at that time  so i had no knowledge of what  was in it . the next night we went to my in laws home and my husband said tell them what you saw, so i did. with that they said didn't you read the paper and we answered no we don't get it. they then pulled out that evenings paper and there on the front page just below the fold was a picture of 2 uniformed policemen from niagara falls ny who said that they saw a ufo and it appeared to them about 10 minutes after i had seen it and what they described was very simlar to what i had seen
content.summary: Huge silent object with very large windows passed above the house tops very slowly inside was lighted with red and could see instrument panels

content.detailedDescription:
It was a summer's evening in july of 1976. my husband, myself and five children were headed home to ortonville, mn. from a family get together in fergus falls, minn.
we turned onto highway 75 and were headed south. it was a cloudy evening and just before reaching the outskirts of fairmount, nd (a border town) i happened to look out the car window towards the west and saw this object coming out of the clouds.  it was disc shaped with a protruding bottom.  i was sure i was just seeing things so didn't say anything right a way.  
then i looked again and the object was still there but this time it dematerialized. within a second it had materialized.  finally told my husband who was driving to take a quick look and see what he thought the "thing" was.  he said right a way it was no airplane and had no idea what it was.
we drove a long and the object kept coming closer to us. during this time it dematerialized and materialized at least three times.  we couldn't believe what we were seeing and became quite anxious.  the children were also scared and wondered what was going on.  by now we could make out it was a silver metallic color but it made no sound. there were no lights or windows. 
it approached our car and for the next sixty miles it hovered above our car some times switching sides.  one minute it would be on my husband's side and the next second on my side.  we kept swerving our heads trying to see where it was going. by now we were all quite frightened and even my husband who was usually calm was agitated. he was having a time driving and still try to keep track of what was going on.
as we drove down the highway we noticed some cars and even semi's were pulling over to the side of the road.  as we passed by, they pointed their fingers at the top of our car and some even honked their horns.  i remember specifically one car going by us with a woman driving.  as she went by her eyes were as big as saucers and her mouth was wide open.  she looked terrified! and i am sure we looked the same to her!
as we continued our journey home cars kept pulling over, honking and pointing.  about two miles out of ortonville, the object left us and landed behind a grove of trees. i saw it land but when i looked again, it was completely gone.
the next day we mentioned what we saw to a few people.  some of them checked to find out if there were was any air traffic during the time we were there and there wasn't any.  
during the time of this happening we didn't know about ufo's but even after thirty nine years i know the exact area where i first noticed it and the exact place where it landed.
what still bothers me is why did the ufo follow us for such a length of time? what was it after?  there was no time loss or anything that affected any of us (i don't think!)  suppose this will remain a mystery!
content.summary: We had no idea at the time we were witnessing a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was recording the harrier jet hovering.
i noticed it as a object flew under it at a glance.
i was sure it wasnt man made as they displayed a f22 raptor and they said it was the fastest vehicle on the planet.
the object flew by at a very fast speed.
i knew it was out of this planet felt happy in a way.
it flew off screen. i was never going to see it again.
content.summary: Seen during harrier demo at airshow

content.detailedDescription:
Just exit the 23 freeway turn east to head toward simi valley. while driving along olsen rd i looked up and saw a gray tube descending in a angle toward the ground. my first thought was the object was going to crash. it continued just above the hill (didn't seam like a lot of space above the hill)until i lost vision. i expected to see a cloud of dust or something but there was none. i never saw any wings just a grayish looking tube kinda like a large fuel tank for a aircraft. 
 i did notice a small fixed wing aircraft above the sighting but the airplane appeared to be somewhat far away but kinda above the object. 
 a drone? it was weird so i wanted to let you hear about it.
 i have never seen anything before like that in the air. previous air force here, so this event led me mind searching as to what it may of been.
content.summary: Gray tube thought the object was going to crash
